original_title: NFL Cheerleaders: Making the Squad: San Diego Chargers
overview: Sure, NFL cheerleaders are sexy, but they're also strong dancers and even stronger personalities, as you'll learn from this documentary about what it takes to be a San Diego Charger cheerleader. From initial screening to final selection, the film follows more than 350 applicants as they pursue their gridiron goals. Interviews with cheerleader hopefuls and program directors, as well as audition and calendar shoot footage, are featured.
title: NFL Cheerleaders: Making the Squad: San Diego Chargers
